Once President submits there’s a short time by law it must be voted on and passed... its smart to seek agreement before submission. Everyone knows the process is waiting on the Speaker... and our constituents should know this vital agreement to Midwest is being delayed by her.

The bottom line is she refuses to support nor commit to bring to vote... the Admin is seeking her support first. Once Admin submits there’s a short timeline that Congress must approve. Her delay is hurting our country.
She needs to say she’ll bring it up for a vote... it will pass overwhelmingly. The Admin is working to get her commitment before submitting it.
It’s because the Speaker has not signaled her support for it. They’re working to get an agreement and then submit.
